name: Dance school
description: BASE23.se is a famous dance school in Stockholm, Sweden, and belongs to the government. They have used an access database file to manage students, classes for over 20 years. I and my teammates helped them to manage more easily by creating a management system with an admin dashboard and mobile application.
features: Courses, programs, assessments, schedules, reports,... management
Microsoft Outlook, Fortnox API, Google Drive, Amazon AWS integrated
Have both web app and mobile app

name: Online assessment
description: Our goal is to create a new system to handle premium online testing for students and to support as many interactive, complex question types as possible. Students can register online and buy test packs suitable to their grade. Once they bought a test pack, they can perform all tests in it online at anytime convenient to them. I and my teammates built 2 web apps for this project, 1 for question player and the other for admin dashboard to manage stuffs
features: Questions, assessments, test packs, test suites,... management
Player for many different question types: single/multiple choice, fill in blank, drag drop

name: Miles at Sea
description: Miles at Sea is a GPS tracking app that allows seafarers to track and document their experience at sea, and automatically build a digital logbook of their voyages. The app is available in Apple App Store and Google Play Store.
features: Real-time tracking location and save voyage to database

name: Mario Framework
description: Mario Framework is a platform to help students with disabilities reach their potential in the classroom. It also connects educators and give them a professional growth.
features: Courses, programs, assessments, schedules, reports,... management

name: DayOne
description: DayOne is my company's product. It helps to create functional teams, clear communications and good workflows for F & B stores.
features: Workspaces, teams, tasks, FAQs, users,...  management
Have both web app and mobile app

name: MIRL
description: MIRL (Made In Real Life) is the industryâ€™s first decentralized fashion brand in the metaverse. My company DayOne cooperated with MIRL and ByBit to create MIRL ecosystem. The ecosystem includes several websites with web3 technology to mint NFTs, check NFT rarity, voting, buy clothes from MIRL,...
features: NFT minting & NFT generation & NFT listing on Opensea
Voting power based on token balance

name: Mailrats
description: Mailrats is a powerful web3 messaging tool to connect people through wallet addresses. People can also earn money from replying their inboxes

name: VoiceGift
description: VoiceGift helps people to create a digital gift that includes text, background image, background music and voice record.
